website_summaries.verdict: The patented design of these nasal strips is great for those who need extra lift and flexible fit.
pros: Patented, flexible design provides impressive lift
Does a good job increasing nasal airflow
cons: Adhesive tends to come unstuck on oily skin, but it works well for most users

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves these...even though I wear them!
customer_reviews.text: Short & sweet. Easy to apply and remove. Comfortable. Best of all, they stopped my snoring! My wife says I don’t make a peep anymore and sound like I’m breathing easier while asleep. Thank you...thank you...thank you!
customer_reviews.author: cgbosn4 - Ret.

customer_reviews.title: They come right off.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. They are great for the first five minutes that they actually stay on my nose, then they just peel right off. Ive tried a few different brands and they always stayed put, but not these. Ive had much better luck with the generic WalMart brand strips but this was a good price for a large quantity so I figured I'd try these. At least I didnt spend a lot for them, so oh well. Live and learn.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Not real sticky in the direct sunshine and heat with low humidity.
customer_reviews.text: I am a little disappointed. BIG Advertisement vs actual performance. But: I am 76 and live in the Arizona desert. Use nose strips daily for years and always >looking for the best model for my application. These do not stay stuck on my nose in the heat here,start peeling on the ends as soon as sweating starts. They do look quality made and it is a good idea, the spring embedded to help lift. For some they may be just right. My application vs other brands not so good.
customer_reviews.author: Goofy one

customer_reviews.title: I like these better than Breathe Rights!
customer_reviews.text: They are just the right amount of sticky, though they also leave a little sticky film. They have improved upon BR's design and lift the sides of the nostrils really well. As with the others, I wipe the sides of my nose with a little alcohol and add a tiny amount of lotion on the bridge of my nose to avoid it sticking to that sensitive skin. So they are a little better in design and cost less. No brainer for me!
customer_reviews.author: Patti W.

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: The individual package is impossible to open when my glasses are off. Breathe Right does not have this problem. As instructed, I wash my face (which means glasses off) then try in vain to open the small individual wrapping off the nasal strip. Whoever was the designer did not create the actual user-environment required to use the product. If he/she had actually removed their glasses, they also, would not be able to remove the wrapper from the nasal strip.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Worth is for most
customer_reviews.text: Overall these are better then the Breath Right strips. Main factor for 4 stars instead of 4 is the individual packaging is a pain to open. The opening tabs are in the slide and small. So if you have bigger hands it's a bit of a pain. The other reason is with the Breath Right strips if I was exhausted and put on on without washing my nose, it would stick. These will not. Huge plus though for these strips. Almost no sticky residue when left behind when removed. I also feel these work slightly better as well. Well work trying these out. I will also be purchasing them again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay put
customer_reviews.text: I've used brand name breathing strips before, but they're not cheap. When I saw these, I figured I'd give them a try. Frankly, I should have paid the premium for the real thing because these were a waste of money. It doesn't matter how well I wash my face, how carefully I place them, how long I hold them down for, inevitably when I wake up in the morning the best I can hope for is for one side to be stuck down.
customer_reviews.author: Kae Winters

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These nasal strips are made of plastic flexible according to the box there really oversized they’re not like the cotton ones or the cloth ones that are the tan color these will eventually of all the useful start hurting your nose and be really uncomfortable I’m definitely going to return it I would research other ones that maybe just go back to the cloth ones the clear feature is really nice but you can totally tell that it’s on your nose because of the oversize
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Knight77

customer_reviews.title: Good appearance, quality and price
customer_reviews.text: Just as good and comparable to Breathe Right, I have a slim nose and they still fit ok. The adhesive is just about right and taking them off is easy. I seemed to have better air intake with these, we'll see after a month or so, I would say I slept better as well. I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job just like the better known name brand...I have been using nasal strips for years to reduce snoring and aid in sleep - these stayed stuck to my nose the whole night and was relatively easy to take off, did the job very well. Living in the desert climate of Las Vegas, Nevada, I am proof they work even in harder conditions than what most people experience. Great value for the money, I will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Philliber

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing results with the first use. I breath so much easier at night with greatly reduced snoring! Do not waste your money on other methods like uncomfortable mouth plates (who can sleep with those??). These are so easy to use, you forget you have them on and you do not want to forget them before going to bed! These strips come with extra tabs to make it an even better product. Give these a shot and you will be reordering them for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like these strips:(
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the real thing to me. Breathe Right strips adhere well, they’re made of soft band aid type material, and they don’t have sharp edges. These clear passage strips don’t adhere as well and feel plasticky and sharp. It feels like I cut up an old credit card into strips and slapped some glue on a strip and stuck it on my nose. I used these a few nights and then found a brand name breathe right strip hiding in my nightstand. No comparison to me, these off brand strips don’t even compare. Too bad because I really wanted to like them:(
customer_reviews.author: Rcat8872

customer_reviews.title: Better than Breathe Right
customer_reviews.text: I like these better than Breath Right. These stick my nose better. There is also a little line that helps you align the strip in the middle of your nose. I use a cpap machine and these strips keep my nasal passages open so I can use just a nasal mask and not a full face mask.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Truth

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These things work GREAT! Better than Breathe Right strips! They adhere better, come off easier in the morning, they open my nose better, and there’s no annoying itch like I do with Breathe Rights because these stay stuck and don’t begin to peel off, which causes an itching sensation! And they COST LESS! These are a winner, try them and you’ll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Ebudua

customer_reviews.title: best I've used!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using nasal strips for many years, can't sleep without them. These are the best I have come across and have reordered three of four times. For some reason they don't pull the skin off my nose like the brand named ones. They also open easy most of the time, but lately they are difficult to open. Amazon however seems to raise the price on reorders!
customer_reviews.author: Bible Vern

customer_reviews.title: they stay on!
customer_reviews.text: These work quite well and I'm not allergic to them! They adhere great-i live in 115+ temps for most of the year and they stay on, where the name brand does not. They are latex free, which is hard to find in these strips, because this seems to be the only brand that actually sticks without latex! I'm very happy with this purchase-second time ordering and I will continue to do so!
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline D. Busk

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Does not stick at all.
customer_reviews.text: These do not stay on at all. The adhesive is absolutely garbage. I went through about 4 just to get one to stay on for 10 minutes, then it fell off also. Will be returning them. Never had a problem with the non-clear ones, so these are either fake or just inferior.
customer_reviews.author: NSAdrone17

customer_reviews.title: Best, most affordable available!
customer_reviews.text: These are similar to Large nasal strips I get in Target, if not the same, re-branded. I prefer these clear ones because the tan ones have a padding to them that really sticks to your pores and can rip the skin off if you use them every night. These clear ones are perfect with no such problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything about Clear Passage is great. Works as well as the leading brand. The reason I gave it four stars is the extra strength size is a little too small. My husband prefers the large size. To be clear, Clear Passage defines very well the size extra strength is. It is just personal preference wanting extra durability along with a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: rd

customer_reviews.title: Much better than other options!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! They stay on for 12+ hours, work just as well as another popular brand, and leave no residue at all when you take them off with a little water! I have used a different brand of breathe strips for years. Yes they work but more often than not they would be loose by morning. Also, the adhesive was a huge pain to get off.
customer_reviews.author: vballBlake

customer_reviews.title: No more middle of the night elbow to the ribs.
customer_reviews.text: Love these, they apparently work well since I'm not getting elbowed in the middle of the night anymore. If you tend to have oily skin as I do I would recommend wiping your nose down with rubbing alcohol before applying so they stick through the night. In the morning they peel off pain free. I have also notice that I am sleeping better and for longer periods of time. I used to only sleep about five to six hours but I'm close to eight now on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive is Not Strong Enough
customer_reviews.text: Although these were comfortable they did not make it through the night without coming loose. I tried it several nights before I determined it was the adhesive that isn’t strong enough. These were more cost effective that what i usually use but it’s no good if I can’t get a complete night of relief. I’ll be going back to my usual brand.
customer_reviews.author: Slumber Skinz

customer_reviews.title: Great breathing device!
customer_reviews.text: I love these things, it makes breathing so much easier at night. My wife says they do not help with snoring. I don’t know, but what a difference in breathing! The adhesive holds well, but isn’t too hard to remove in morning. I use every night. By using I no longer need to use an antihistamine tablet.
customer_reviews.author: cncrestoration

customer_reviews.title: Not for small noses or sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: If you have a small nose, these are not for you, the ends are too long and end up attaching to your cheeks. The adhesive is really strong, so strong it took a piece of flesh from my nose. I’ve been wearing nose strips for years, Breathe Right and Clear Passage, these just aren’t for small noses and sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: JeanieLe

customer_reviews.title: Will not adhere!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a week. They will not stick to my nose all night. I have used nasal strips for years. These are some of the worse. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Anderson Family

customer_reviews.title: Very strong and wide coverage
customer_reviews.text: After using Breathe Right Extra Strength for years, I decided to give these a shot. Well, I just ordered my second box. These nasal strips are very strong and easily hold for 8 hours. They are wider than standard strips, so they are great for extremely stuffy nights. Great quality and value compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Compare to the better known brand
customer_reviews.text: I can't determine why, but for me these strips are more comfortable than the better know brand which I have used for years. I seen complaints that they don't stay on. I had that problem the first night, but the second night I followed directions and washed the bridge of my nose with a warm soapy wash cloth and dried with a towel. Never had one come loose since, and they peel off without pain.
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH A SVESTKA

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this sort of product for 20 years now as I have a deviated septum and can't breathe well at night. Works great for me. I have sensitive skin on my nose, so I use the clear version as the adhesive feels less like it's going to pull off my skin. The opaque version has a much stronger adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: Linda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price!
customer_reviews.text: I have a deviated septum since I can remember (yep, you guessed it, since the dark ages😂). No sleeping on the right side because I couldn't breathe thru my nose. These strips work to alleviate that issue and I get a better nite's sleep! The price is also much better than the national brand and work just as well. I recommend for anyone needing a product like this.
customer_reviews.author: P. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: I immediately used this the same night I received it (which was 2 nights ago). I cannot believe it's taken me so long to try this. It's AMAZING!!! I have always had trouble breathing at night and have kept my husband up more nights than I can say. Oh, and I've never been able to sleep with my mouth closed. After using this product, I am finally able to sleep with my mouth closed and am not waking my husband up...I would highly recommend this product 😊
customer_reviews.author: NA

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: We have tried to make these work. We initially purchased these to help with my husbands snoring - didn’t help. Then we tried to use them when I had nasal congestion- didn’t work. They are less comfortable than breathe right strips and they don’t help anything at all
customer_reviews.author: Aero

customer_reviews.title: Great Strip for your money
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this strips. I was going to pay extra for a better known brand, which we've used in the past, but I went with these and I am glad I did. He is sleeping much better now that he can breath more clearly. I will be making another order!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor adhesive and not enough lift
customer_reviews.text: Not good. Poor adhesive and not enough lift to keep the nasal passages open. I bought based on price per strip, but that was a mistake. I'll be tossing 49 of the 50 into the trash. Buy a more established brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Works as Advertised
customer_reviews.text: These nasal strips work as advertised, as well as Breathe Right Extra Sensitive. There are 2 things I don't like: what would be the center line is offset and there are slits at both end, which I'm not sure what the function is suppose to be, but it leaves adhesive on my glasses. However, these are cheaper than Breathe Right Strips.
customer_reviews.author: J. Luke

customer_reviews.title: Got my boyfriend to lessen his snoring
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend and I use these at night -- he snores like a hibernating bear and these didn't completely take away the snoring, but it definitely lessened the noise. After using these, I fell rested, oxygenated, and like I got a good night's sleep. I also use these when I have a headache or when I am doing light exercise. My only issue with this brand is that sometimes they do not stay on the entire night.
customer_reviews.author: Bri S.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than Breathe Right Strips
customer_reviews.text: I have to use nasal strips in order to successfully use my cpap machine. I’ve been using Breathe Right Strips for a few years. They are hard to remove and they leave an awful sticky residue that is near impossible to remove. These strips are strong, yet peel off easily. The price is a huge bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Trepka

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your nostrils open
customer_reviews.text: These are cheaper than the ones from the local department store and work just as well. I find that they help me to sleep better. I don't have any data to really prove it, but I tend to sleep better when I use them, than I do when i don't use them, so I'll get out of bed to put one on if I've forgotten.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mercer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product to let you breath regular at night
customer_reviews.text: For years I was using Breathe Right, because of disorderly sinus condition. Than recently when I was on the Amazon site, I checked to see if they sold Breathe Right and discovered Clear Passage so I ordered one. I came to find out they held on my nose better than Breathe Right without more irritation. I will use them from now on
customer_reviews.author: billykem

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are good, but the BreathRight holds to your nose better. I had to put some alcohol in a swab n clean the area real good so they would stick. Never did that with the other. Do they work- yes, but when i run out I'll go back to the other brand. I think these maybe cheaper if that is any compromise.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Breakouts, bruises and falls off
customer_reviews.text: My nose got bruised. Broke out. On top of it all the damn thing wouldn’t stick. I’ve used the cloth ones and they work great... these suck. I’m so upset that $16 is down the drain and I haven’t had good sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewsforyou

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: These work just as well, if not better, than Breathe Right strips and the price per quantity is cheaper. I haven't had any issues with them coming off in the night. I'm deducting a star because the packaging of the individual strips needs improvement. They are harder to get out than Breathe Right strips.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ames

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sleep or exercise at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I use for exercise and sleep. The only issue is that it sometimes starts to loosen as I exercise. Most of the time it’s good to go. Don’t notice it when I’m sleeping, except it can cause a small gap between my sleep mask and nose bridge that lets light through. Otherwise, I’m really happy w this product. Play around with where you put it on your nose: try lower/higher on the bridge to see what works best for you.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Eidsness

customer_reviews.title: good quality good price
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the Breathe Right Strips extra strength cleaning my nose with a little soap and water before bed worked great found some 6 for a dollar at the dollar store they did not work through the night these work perfectly through the night
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: For me these are a must before going to bed. Without these I get so stuffed up, I end up waking up throughout the night. I sleep like a baby when I have my nasal strips. Same goes for my fiancé she loves them as well. They are super adhesive and actually sometimes leave a mark on my nose but it’s only cosmetic no pain.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: These work great to help my nasal congestion and especially when I ...
customer_reviews.text: These work great to help my nasal congestion and especially when I sleep at night and am sick I’ll find it hard to breathe at night but these make it so I don’t have to breathe through my mouth and don’t have to pump myself full of meds. Only down side is there are some redness after removing it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Breathe better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been having trouble breathing while I sleep for a while. I felt like breathing strips were an old person thing and I didn’t want to admit that I’m leaning toward that age bracket. I decided to swallow my pride and try them out. They have made a huge difference. I breathe and sleep so much better now. The strips are easy to use and have never come off in the night. I’m on my second box and have set them up on a subscription as I don’t imagine that I’ll want to stop using them anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Wow! I can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous! I had previously tried extra strength Breathe Right strips, but these are so much better. And they are cheaper. They open up my nasal passages that had collapsed a bit, allowing me to breath better. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper L.

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: have used these in the past, and they still work very well. Make absolutely sure that your nose isn't oily or wet, otherwise the adhesive won't stick, or will pop off sometime during the night.
customer_reviews.author: Dewclaws

customer_reviews.title: It’s great adhesive well,  though it does not irritate your skin
customer_reviews.text: Better than any of all the leading brands I have use for years This product surpassed my expectations It great,it does not irritate your skin I recommend if
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: No likey
customer_reviews.text: Stick with the name brand product. I bought these to save money. They are really thick and don’t fit like the name brand product I bought in the past. Going back to those.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than the other name brand ones and much more affordable. I'll never buy the other brand again!
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and works right away. It was so easy to use and it is very comfortable compared to great right, feels like there is nothing in my nose. Not sure why some are complaining about the adhesive because mine sticks so well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennx

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow decoration
customer_reviews.text: Would work great if they would stay on. End up stuck to the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Does help me a lot
customer_reviews.text: I think these work really well, and better for me than the regular ones. I can tell that I don't wake up with a sore throat after using these overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have sinus and allergy issues, and I was hoping that these nasal strips would help. They don't stay on well and they are absolutely useless. Using Flonase works much more effectively. Don't be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: Calamity

customer_reviews.title: Leave red marks on nose & didn't work
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband based on other reviews and unfortunately they did not work for us. Despite following the instructions these cut into his nose, leaving the bridge of his nose red and sore and they did not help with his snoring. We tried them for a week so unfortunately we cannot return. :(
customer_reviews.author: KLoMiller25

customer_reviews.title: Thank goodness now I can breathe!
customer_reviews.text: During allergy season (& for me that’s almost all year) I have nose drops that I use several times a day also the netti pot several times, but these strips do the trick at night.
customer_reviews.author: Marge

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: These stink and are a waste of $$$... even if they were only 10 cents!!! Extra Strength... NOT!!! Would have given 0 stars but have to give one in order to give this horrible review!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Stays on all night.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but they work. If they don't stick well, clean your nose with soap and water. Rinse and dry well. Stays on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Neolantis

customer_reviews.title: Clear Passage Strips are GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first Clear Passage, with a wee mite of reluctance, what with the reviews noting problems with adhesion. My nose area is so oily, I could auction off the “oil rights”! After three boxes, found Clear Passage were sticking to my nose like gum on shoes. They really work,...however, as a nonagenarian, a slightly improved package design could help when opening the individual packages...thank you for a most usable product!
customer_reviews.author: Gallop Tango

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it’s a good product. The adherence was really good. Maybe too good. It slightly hurts the skin on my nose and it’s a little irritating but I would bend it a little more so it’s not soo bendy.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Causes Irritation
customer_reviews.text: These do function well and stay on but in the morning my nose is swollen and occasionally the skin is broken. Also, it's difficult to center on the nose so I mark the center line before applying.
customer_reviews.author: Raphael DiEspinosa

customer_reviews.title: Work just like the name brand nasal strips.
customer_reviews.text: Love these nasal strips. They are all they State on the package. My second order during the pandemic. I don’t have to leave the house.
customer_reviews.author: pac62

customer_reviews.title: An instant relief!
customer_reviews.text: Way better than Breath Right name brand! I used name brand strip for a solid year and they were so so. I would take them off in my sleep because I could feel them and they just wouldn't work or would work 50% of the time (snoring prevention). These have stopped my snoring and I don't feel them on my nose at all. (Well...compared to name brand strips) those who say they don't stick didnt properly clean and dry their nose prior to using.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. On the nights they stayed on his face, I noticed a decrease in snoring but did not keep him from snoring completely.
customer_reviews.author: Rissa

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these for a while , now. They are as good as the , well known , Breath Right brand , and are cheaper. Most cheaper strips don’t stick well , but these do.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: New design works great!
customer_reviews.text: Stays on all night by allowing the stiffness to perform independently from the adhesive points. It is necessary to wash your face and dry thoroughly prior to applying. The oils in your face will reduce adhesive effect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Mazzarell

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t really help my pregnancy congestion
customer_reviews.text: My first time using this type of product because of pregnancy congestion. Unfortunately, not really the right product for me, it is not comfortable and doesn’t really help my snoring.
customer_reviews.author: MEI Y WONG

customer_reviews.title: Like plastic- didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 didn't stay on. The third one did but didn't help me. The material is more like plastic than like a bandaid & other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Villa

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: These do the job but I can't figure out how to take them off without the occasional bruising (for lack of a better word). Twice i've had the adhesive fail, but if i wash and dry my face well before putting it on there is not problem and they really do help me breathe more easily all night.
customer_reviews.author: Catryne

customer_reviews.title: USELESS - DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: I was fooled by the good reviews since these are cheaper than the brand nasal strips... Didn't work for me at all..
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Work great for half the price of big name brands
customer_reviews.text: These breathing strips have worked very well for me and they were much cheaper than the big brands. I have never used any other strips, so I can't really compare, but I am happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Everton

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your face is SUPER clean.
customer_reviews.text: They could improve the adhesive they use. If my face is not SUPER clean, the strip will get detached and there is no way to put it properly, so I have to throw it out. Otherwise, it is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: These did stay on my hubby well. The size was fine. But they do nothing to help. He still snores. But if nasal strips work for you these are fine and cheaper then the name brand.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kincaid

customer_reviews.title: worked as advertised.. i live alone so I ...
customer_reviews.text: worked as advertised.. i live alone so I don't know if I stop snoring or not.. but def open my nasal passage..
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell G

customer_reviews.title: As good as name brand!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, I’ve been burned before by off-name. These work and adhere just as well as Breathe Right and at half the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rob M.

customer_reviews.title: Work great...
customer_reviews.text: Buy these all time from Amazon. They work great and let me breathe and help me to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde51

customer_reviews.title: Just like name brand!
customer_reviews.text: They work just like the Advanced "Name Brand" nose strips at a fraction of the cost...I now have them on subscribe & save :)
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't stick well
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another brand that I had before this is not good. It doesn't stick well and also it's not so affected for nasal obstruction. Not approved.
customer_reviews.author: Lis

customer_reviews.title: but we use two and it seems to work on good days. But if he had a long day ...
customer_reviews.text: My bf still snores if he is too tired that day, but we use two and it seems to work on good days. But if he had a long day and doesn’t roll over on his side he will snore!! That’s why I’m giving only 3 stars because it says extra strength so I don’t know!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Bleis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. But the real Breathe Right strips. There is no comparison.
customer_reviews.author: NTO

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: We use them all the time. They stay on and keep my nasal passages open all night.
customer_reviews.author: Michele37

customer_reviews.title: These work, but are too small for my big nose!
customer_reviews.text: Next time I will find some that specifically say "large." These do work, but would be better if a bit longer. These should be fine for folks with normal size schnozes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary W.

customer_reviews.title: Great strips!
customer_reviews.text: These actually work really well. Doesn't 100% stop the snoring, but definitely a huge improvement. And I can actually breathe through my nose at night! My nose does get a little itchy at times, but I'm sensitive to adhesive anyway. Its tolerable and does not cause a rash or anything.
customer_reviews.author: mrsroberts82

customer_reviews.title: Better than breathe-right and cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I bought these by mistake, but they are far superior to breathe-right, cover and lift more of your nose, leave less of a mark, and work longer. Hurray for generics!
customer_reviews.author: Mockturtle

customer_reviews.title: Not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying Breathe Right strips. My mistake. These barely stick to my nose. If they stick at the start of the night, they always pop off before the night is over. I will read descriptions more carefully in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and hard to remove
customer_reviews.text: The plastic is very stiff and digs into your skin especially if you have a flatter, wider nose bridge (asian nose). Hard to remove even though I soaked the strip per the instructions to remove, adhesive is strong. Since facial skin is delicate, especially under the eye, I was worried I was damaging my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than the original brand
customer_reviews.text: These stay on and keep you breathing all night, even with a cold!
customer_reviews.author: CMC

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Have bought this product many times and it really helps you to breath better when you sleep making you have a nicest rest.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar D.

customer_reviews.title: Can't get used to them
customer_reviews.text: Works by making your nose bigger. Just can't get used to this thing plastered to my nose all night.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan & Susan

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not same quality as Breathe Right. Adhesion less than Breathe Right. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: G. Malone

customer_reviews.title: No affect of my snoring
customer_reviews.text: Didnt help with my snoring at all. But may work for others, guess it was worth a shot.
customer_reviews.author: Brina

customer_reviews.title: Nasal strips while using a CPAP. Excellent adhesion!
customer_reviews.text: I use these nasal strips while using my nasal cpap which has a humidifier. The best feature of this product is that the adhesion during the night is great and the strips continue to stay firm. I have used other products before which did not adhere and would become loose during the night. These strips are very sticky, which for me is the best feature.
customer_reviews.author: David G Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Clear Passage Nasal Strips Extra Strength Clear function as well as the popular brands and at a more reasonable price. They are my choice at this point in time. The Tan strips function as well, but I like the Clear strips better as they are a bit more tolerable when looking at myself in the mirror.
customer_reviews.author: WRC

customer_reviews.title: These do perform as well as the expensive strips.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as the higher-priced strips, much better than the low-priced house brand I tried (Kroger). I always do a quick wipe down with rubbing alcohol before applying the strip. As long as they keep up the quality, I'm their customer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hobgood

customer_reviews.title: If you need a large, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: The product description says "medium/large" for size. There is nothing large about this product. Furthermore the packaging isn't even marked for size. These may be "large" for an infant but certainly not for an average size adult. Waste of $15.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Can't live without.... way better than Breathe Right
customer_reviews.text: they have this cool slit on them, that helps them hug your nose... brilliant. Can't sleep without them!
customer_reviews.author: mikeymike3

customer_reviews.title: Bruised my nose upon first use...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only used one so far...it bruised my nose. It adhered well and opened my nostrils making breathing easier, but in the morning upon removal I discovered a bruise where the center of the strip was stuck. I’m waiting for the bruise to go away before I try any of the other 49 strips lol
customer_reviews.author: jason s.

customer_reviews.title: Really helps sleep
customer_reviews.text: Allergies keep me tossing from one side to the other at night as nasal passages fill up. These are amazing. Opens my nostrils enough so that I can breathe out of my nose and I have been sleeping better! Stick on all night.
customer_reviews.author: athlete

customer_reviews.title: Does everything but work.
customer_reviews.text: It adheres, its comfortable and easy to use. The only thing its lacking is the strength to actually help open your sinuses. Pay the extra bucks for the original Breath Right that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMomma

product_meta.title: Clear Passage Nasal Strips, Clear Extra Strength, 50 Count | Works Instantly to Improve Sleep, Reduce Snoring, Relieve Nasal Congestion Due to Colds & Allergies (Clear)
feature_bullets: WORKS INSTANTLY | Instantly & gently opens nasal passages to improve sleep, reduce snoring, and relieve nasal congestion due to colds or allergies
SMART-FLEX PATENTED TECHNOLOGY | Patented technology for 20% more superior hold and 20% more coverage where its needed most when compared to the leading brand
50% STRONGER LIFT | Instantly relieves nasal congestion for sensitive skin
USE FOR | Sleeping, during the day, or exercising
COMFORTABLE AND EASY | 1. Wash nose with soap & water, dry completely, 2. Center nasal strip over bridge of nose, 3. Press and hold for 30 seconds
